item.Q:

item.A:

bì

item.Q:

to burst open; to split at the seam
item.A:
绽 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 綻
zhàn

chéng
丞相 chéngxiāng the most senior minister of many kingdoms or dynasties (with varying roles); prime minister

谍 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 諜
dié
间谍 (間諜) jiàndié spy

núlì slave

traditional: 奴隸主
núlìzhǔ slave owner

traditional: 奴隸制
núlìzhì slavery
qīngxī clear; distinct

traditional: 辦公室
bàngōngshì office
shuǐwèi water level
qiánfāng ahead; the front
niánnián year after year; yearly; every year

traditional: 邏輯
luóji logic

traditional: 見解
jiànjiě opinion; view; understanding
guāngmíng bright (future); promising
děngdài wait for; await

traditional: 代謝
dàixiè replacement; substitution; metabolism (biol.)

traditional: 嚴密
yánmì strict; tight (organization, surveillance etc)

traditional: 屠殺
túshā massacre

traditional: 屬性
shǔxìng attribute; property
rútóng like; as
rénshēn personal; on one's person

traditional: 強弱
qiángruò strong or weak; intensity; amount of force or pressure

traditional: 滑動
huádòng slippage
